CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 18,19 However , to the best of our knowledge , BT / BO - based polymers simultaneously with high field - effect mobilities and high photovoltaic performance are very rare so far.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Material Name" entities:

1. BT - This stands for "Boron-doped Titanium dioxide"
2. BO - This stands for "Boron-doped Oxide"
3. polymers - This refers to a class of materials that are composed of long chains of repeating molecules.

So, the Material Name entities in the paragraph are:

* BT
* BO
* polymers
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Of course! My apologies for the confusion earlier. Here are the Material Name entities in the paragraph:

1. BT
2. BO

These are the only entities in the paragraph that refer directly to a Material Name.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid Material Name entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| BT |
| BO |

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 18,19 However , to the best of our knowledge , BT / BO - based polymers simultaneously with high field - effect mobilities and high photovoltaic performance are very rare so far.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Property Name" entities:

1. "high field-effect mobilities" - This is a property name that refers to the ability of a material to move charge carriers (electrons or holes) in an electric field.
2. "high photovoltaic performance" - This is also a property name that refers to the ability of a material to convert sunlight into electrical energy in a solar cell or other photovoltaic device.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

Sure, here are the relevant entities that refer to material properties in the given paragraph:

1. "high field-effect mobilities" - This is a property name that refers to the ability of a material to move charge carriers (electrons or holes) in an electric field.
2. "high photovoltaic performance" - This is also a property name that refers to the ability of a material to convert sunlight into electrical energy in a solar cell or other photovoltaic device.

So, the two relevant entities that refer to material properties in the paragraph are:

1. "high field-effect mobilities"
2. "high photovoltaic performance"

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to material properties, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Property Name":

| Property Name |
| --- |
| high field-effect mobilities |
| high photovoltaic performance |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 18,19 However , to the best of our knowledge , BT / BO - based polymers simultaneously with high field - effect mobilities and high photovoltaic performance are very rare so far.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following entities can be identified as "Property Value" entities:

1. High field-effect mobilities
2. High photovoltaic performance

Explanation:

1. High field-effect mobilities: This entity represents the value of the mobility of charge carriers in a material, which is a measure of how efficiently charge carriers can move through the material. In the context of the paragraph, the author is highlighting the rare combination of high field-effect mobilities and high photovoltaic performance in BT/BO-based polymers.
2. High photovoltaic performance: This entity represents the value of the efficiency of a material in converting sunlight into electrical energy. In the context of the paragraph, the author is highlighting the rare combination of high photovoltaic performance and high field-effect mobilities in BT/BO-based polymers.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that refer to the value of material properties in the given paragraph:

1. High field-effect mobilities
2. High photovoltaic performance

These two entities refer to the value of the material properties of BT/BO-based polymers, specifically their ability to efficiently move charge carriers and convert sunlight into electrical energy, respectively.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Property Value":

| Property Value |
| --- |
| High field-effect mobilities |
| High photovoltaic performance |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
